name: SUPERSPACE (torontofangirl, adriendittrick)
description:
SUPER SPACE is a bullet hell game where time only moves when you move. Can you survive all waves of enemies coming from the OTHER SIDE of space? This game was made in slightly more than 48 hours.

Controls
- ENTER: start game
- WASD/Arrow keys: move
- F4: fullscreen (windows only)

There are 4 upgrades, which can each be picked up only once.

Speed - Increase your movement speed

Slow - Slow down the enemy's fire rate

Shield - Immune for 10 seconds at the start of the next round

Heal - Heal all your hp

Credits:

  • Torontofangirl: code and art (all art is custom in this version)
  • Adrien Dittrick: music and code support
  • This game is based on a game by Benny Heller called Salvage https://e1sif.itch.io/salvage
